thread.title: BRIEF-RAIT Financial Trust - On March 30, Co & The Libby Frischer Family Signed A Letter That Provided Co Would Exempt It From Ownership Limit SEC Filing‍​

title: BRIEF-RAIT Financial Trust - On March 30, Co & The Libby Frischer Family Signed A Letter That Provided Co Would Exempt It From Ownership Limit SEC Filing‍​
text:
Market News April 2, 2018 / 11:40 AM / in 16 minutes BRIEF-RAIT Financial Trust - On March 30, Co & The Libby Frischer Family Signed A Letter That Provided Co Would Exempt It From Ownership Limit SEC Filing‍​ Reuters Staff 
April 2 (Reuters) - RAIT Financial Trust: * SEC FILING‍​ 
* WOULD EXEMPT THE LIBBY FRISCHER FAMILY PARTNERSHIP FROM OWNERSHIP LIMIT PROVIDING NO PERSON MAY OWN OVER 8.3% OF CO'S SHARES Source text: ( bit.ly/2q3fhDt ) Further company coverage:
